mapper.select:
SELECT A.NOTICE_ID, A.TITLE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE_KEY = A.NOTICE_TYPE) NOTICE_TYPE, A.CONTENTS, A.REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN B.NOTICE_SEND_TYPE = 'KAKAO' THEN '카카오톡' ELSE '공지리스트' END SEPARATOR ',') NOTICE_SEND_TYPE FROM NOTICE A, NOTICE_SEND_TYPE B WHERE A.NOTICE_ID = B.NOTICE_ID
AND A.NOTICE_TYPE IN ('ALL', 'BRANCHES')
AND A.NOTICE_TYPE IN ('EMERGENCY', 'OPERATION', 'SYSTEM')
GROUP BY A.NOTICE_ID, A.TITLE, A.NOTICE_TYPE, A.CONTENTS, A.REG_ID, A.REG_DATE

SELECT NOTICE_ID, TITLE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE_KEY = NOTICE_TYPE) NOTICE_TYPE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TYPE IN ('EMERGENCY', 'OPERATION', 'SYSTEM')

SELECT NOTICE_ID, TITLE, (SELECT CODE_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE_KEY = NOTICE_TYPE) NOTICE_TYPE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, TITLE, NOTICE_TYPE, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{title}, #{noticeType}, #{contents}, #{regId}, NOW(), #{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO NOTICE_SEND_TYPE ( NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_SEND_TYPE, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{noticeSendType}, #{regId}, NOW() )
